title: New: Hype Williams – Galice
content:
With tomorrow’s show at the Tufnell Park Dome fast approaching, art-noise duo Hype Williams have released a new track that possesses a far more melody rich sound, perhaps hinting at a more approachable feel to their next LP.

With Galice, the pair have come closer to perfecting the damaged trip-hop sound that so often hesitated in the murky middle ground within their earlier work. The track is still crawling with ideas, textures and tones, with a narrative that still very much exists in the world of metaphysics, this time however it can at least be imagined.

Galice’ is taken from the pair’s forthcoming London 2012 tour CD, it will be available at tomorrow’s show. All tickets are on the door, which open at 9pm, get down early to avoid disappointment.

via No Fear of Pop
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
